name: FT Newsroom: default
definition_yaml:
settings:
  layout.font_size_mobile_small: 100
  layout.font_size_mobile_big: 100
  layout.font_size_tablet: 100
  layout.font_size_desktop: 100
  layout.font_size_big_screen: 120
  layout.body_font:
    name: Metric Web
    url: >-
       https://public.flourish.studio/fonts/d64d08a8-9f67-426c-bc9f-fdb97e7e24cc/stylesheet.css
  layout.margin_top: 0
  layout.margin_right: 0
  layout.margin_bottom: 0
  layout.margin_left: 0
  layout.space_between_sections: custom
  layout.space_between_sections_custom: 1.75
  layout.background_color: '#fff1e5'
  layout.header_logo_enabled: true
  layout.header_logo_src: >-
    https://public.flourish.studio/uploads/1c064a3c-9c0f-4043-8de0-379265d5d2c9.svg
  layout.header_logo_height: 0.25
  layout.header_logo_margin_top: 0
  layout.header_logo_margin_right: 0
  layout.title_size: custom
  layout.title_size_custom: 1.5
  layout.title_line_height: 1.25
  layout.title_weight: normal
  layout.title_space_above: custom
  layout.title_space_above_custom: 0.75
  layout.title_styling: true
  layout.subtitle_size: custom
  layout.subtitle_size_custom: 1.125
  layout.subtitle_line_height: 1.25
  layout.subtitle_color: '#4d4845'
  layout.subtitle_space_above: custom
  layout.subtitle_space_above_custom: 1.25
  layout.subtitle_styling: true
  layout.header_text_size: custom
  layout.header_text_size_custom: 1
  layout.header_text_line_height: 1.25
  layout.header_text_color: '#4d4845'
  layout.footer_text_size: 0.875
  layout.footer_text_color: '#4d4845'
  layout.footer_logo_enabled: true
  layout.footer_logo_src: >-
    https://public.flourish.studio/uploads/43d2c31d-7939-4110-a079-53f54ba93ac6.svg
  layout.footer_logo_height: 0.75
  layout.footer_logo_margin: 0
  layout.footer_logo_order: left
  layout.header_text_styling: false
  color.categorical_palette: &ref_0
    - '#1e558c'
    - '#94d2e6'
    - '#1e8fcc'
    - '#b3325d'
    - '#ff75a3'
    - '#aecc70'
    - '#f34d5b'
    - '#d9ccc3'
  color.categorical_custom_palette: |-
    Conservative:#149ADB
    Labour:#CF4D3C
    Lib Dems:#F09000
    SNP:#FFDF00
    Greens (UK):#8DEB9D
    Plaid Cymru:#5BA373
    Ukip:#7200AB
    Reform:#80CFD6
    Alba:#305EB8
    All for Unity:#F6011E
    Abolish:#990900
    Others:#E0D9D5
    CDU/CSU:#000000
    Greens (Germany):#36AA5B
    SPD:#B80D00
    FDP:#F5BB00
    AfD:#52C0FF
    Left:#73008A
    No:#F25E2A
    Yes:#3DA4AA
    Democrat:#2E56B6
    Democrat Lean:#67B4E2
    Republican:#ED4748
    Republican Lean:#F7ACA4
  color.categorical_extend: false
  controls.control_type: buttons
  controls.button_group_width_mode: auto
  controls.control_styles: true
  controls_style.padding: 0.7
  button_style.font_color: '#006b74'
  button_style.background_selected: '#006b74'
  button_style.background_hover: '#e3e0d6'
  button_style.border_transparency: 1
  button_style.border_color: '#006b74'
  button_style.border_radius: 0
  button_style.button_styles_advanced: true
  dropdown_style.border_styles_advanced: false
  x.line_and_tick_color: '#999189'
  x.line_and_tick_width: 0.063
  x.tick_label_size: 1
  x.tick_label_color: '#4d4845'
  x.tick_label_angle: '0'
  x.title_mode: custom
  x.tick_label_styling: true
  y.line_visible: false
  y.line_and_tick_color: '#999189'
  y.line_and_tick_width: 0
  y.tick_label_size: 1
  y.tick_label_color: '#4d4845'
  y.gridline_color: '#ccc1b7'
  y.gridline_width: 0.063
  y.title_mode: custom
  y.tick_label_styling: true
  y.gridlines_styling: true
  y2.line_visible: false
  y2.line_and_tick_color: '#999189'
  y2.line_and_tick_width: 0
  y2.tick_label_size: 1
  y2.tick_label_color: '#4d4845'
  y2.gridline_color: '#ccc1b7'
  y2.gridline_width: 0.063
  y2.title_mode: custom
  y2.tick_label_styling: true
  y2.gridlines_styling: true
  axes_highlights.x_label_vertical: false
  axes_highlights.x_shadow_enabled: false
  axes_highlights.x_label_y_position: top
  axes_highlights.x_label_x_position: right 
  axes_highlights.x_area_color: '#fffcfa'
  axes_highlights.x_area_opacity: 1
  axes_highlights.x_label_color: '#4d4845'
  axes_highlights.x_line_color: '#66605c'
  axes_highlights.x_line_width: 1
  axes_highlights.x_line_dash: 0
  axes_highlights.x_font_size: 1
  axes_highlights.y_shadow_enabled: false
  axes_highlights.y_label_y_position: below
  axes_highlights.y_label_x_position: right 
  axes_highlights.y_area_color: '#fffcfa'
  axes_highlights.y_area_opacity: 1
  axes_highlights.y_label_color: '#4d4845'
  axes_highlights.y_line_color: '#66605c'
  axes_highlights.y_line_width: 1
  axes_highlights.y_line_dash: 0
  axes_highlights.y_font_size: 1
  legend_categorical.swatch_width: 1.25
  legend_categorical.swatch_height: 0.625
  legend_categorical.swatch_radius: 0
  colors.categorical_palette: *ref_0
  color.palette: *ref_0
  colors.palette: *ref_0
  map_categorical_colors.palette: *ref_0
  point_categorical_colors.palette: *ref_0
  point_colors.categorical_palette: *ref_0
  map_colors.categorical_palette: *ref_0
  legend_categorical_points.swatch_width: 1.25
  legend_categorical_map.swatch_width: 1.25
  legend_categorical_points.swatch_height: 0.625
  legend_categorical_map.swatch_height: 0.625
  legend_categorical_points.swatch_radius: 0
  legend_categorical_map.swatch_radius: 0
colors:
  - FT bars/large areas:
      - '#1e558c'
      - '#94d2e6'
      - '#1e8fcc'
      - '#b3325d'
      - '#ff75a3'
      - '#aecc70'
      - '#f34d5b'
      - '#d9ccc3'
  - FT lines/small areas:
      - '#0f5499'
      - '#ef6590'
      - '#70dce6'
      - '#9dbf57'
      - '#208fce'
      - '#7f062e'
      - '#ce3140'
      - '#c2b7af'
  - FT treemap:
      - '#42a7d2'
      - '#ef6590'
      - '#70dce6'
      - '#9dbf57'
      - '#ee7680'
      - '#c2b7af'
fonts:
  - name: Metric Web
    url: >-
       https://public.flourish.studio/fonts/d64d08a8-9f67-426c-bc9f-fdb97e7e24cc/stylesheet.css
  - name: Financier Display Web
    url: >-
       https://public.flourish.studio/fonts/d64d08a8-9f67-426c-bc9f-fdb97e7e24cc/stylesheet.css

name: FT Newsroom: Social
definition_yaml:
settings:
  layout.font_size_mobile_small: 125
  layout.font_size_mobile_big: 125
  layout.font_size_tablet: 125
  layout.font_size_desktop: 125
  layout.font_size_big_screen: 125
  layout.body_font:
    name: Metric Web
    url: >-
      https://public.flourish.studio/fonts/8ab4830d-7b12-4282-8a18-875a832832cf/stylesheet.css
  layout.font_color: '#8e9095'
  layout.margin_top: 2.5
  layout.margin_right: 2.5
  layout.margin_bottom: 2.5
  layout.margin_left: 2.5
  layout.space_between_sections: custom
  layout.space_between_sections_custom: 1.5
  layout.background_color: '#262A33'
  layout.title_size: custom
  layout.title_size_custom: 1.875
  layout.title_line_height: 2
  layout.title_color: '#ffffff'
  layout.title_weight: normal
  layout.title_space_above: custom
  layout.title_space_above_custom: 1
  layout.title_styling: true
  layout.subtitle_size: custom
  layout.subtitle_size_custom: 1.5
  layout.subtitle_line_height: 1.75
  layout.subtitle_color: '#8e9095'
  layout.subtitle_space_above: custom
  layout.subtitle_space_above_custom: 0
  layout.subtitle_styling: true
  layout.header_text_size: custom
  layout.header_text_size_custom: 1
  layout.header_text_line_height: 1.25
  layout.header_text_color: '#8e9095'
  layout.footer_text_size: 1.25
  layout.footer_text_color: '#8e9095'
  layout.footer_align: left
  layout.header_text_styling: false
  color.categorical_palette: &ref_0
    - '#ff0055'
    - '#00ccff'
    - '#0066ff'
    - '#b1e645'
    - '#f2e5da'
    - '#65798c'
  color.categorical_extend: false
  x.line_and_tick_color: '#8e9095'
  x.line_and_tick_width: 0.063
  x.tick_label_size: 1.25
  x.tick_label_color: '#8e9095'
  x.tick_label_angle: '0'
  x.title_mode: custom
  x.tick_label_styling: true
  y.line_visible: false
  y.line_and_tick_color: '#8e9095'
  y.line_and_tick_width: 0
  y.tick_label_size: 1.25
  y.tick_label_color: '#8e9095'
  y.gridline_color: '#47494d'
  y.gridline_width: 0.063
  y.title_mode: custom
  y.tick_label_styling: true
  y.gridlines_styling: true
  y2.line_visible: false
  y2.line_and_tick_color: '#8e9095'
  y2.line_and_tick_width: 0
  y2.tick_label_size: 1.25
  y2.tick_label_color: '#8e9095'
  y2.gridline_color: '#47494d'
  y2.gridline_width: 0.063
  y2.title_mode: custom
  y2.tick_label_styling: true
  y2.gridlines_styling: true
  axes_highlights.x_label_vertical: false
  axes_highlights.x_shadow_enabled: false
  axes_highlights.x_label_y_position: top
  axes_highlights.x_label_x_position: right 
  axes_highlights.x_area_color: '#ffffff'
  axes_highlights.x_area_opacity: 1
  axes_highlights.x_label_color: '#ffffff'
  axes_highlights.x_line_color: '#ffffff'
  axes_highlights.x_line_width: 1
  axes_highlights.x_line_dash: 0
  axes_highlights.x_font_size: 1
  axes_highlights.y_shadow_enabled: false
  axes_highlights.y_label_y_position: below
  axes_highlights.y_label_x_position: right 
  axes_highlights.y_area_color: '#ffffff'
  axes_highlights.y_area_opacity: 0.1
  axes_highlights.y_label_color: '#ffffff'
  axes_highlights.y_line_color: '#ffffff'
  axes_highlights.y_line_width: 1
  axes_highlights.y_line_dash: 0
  axes_highlights.y_font_size: 1
  legend_container.text_size: 1.25
  legend_categorical.swatch_width: 1.25
  legend_categorical.swatch_height: 0.625
  legend_categorical.swatch_radius: 0
  colors.categorical_palette: *ref_0
  color.palette: *ref_0
  colors.palette: *ref_0
  map_categorical_colors.palette: *ref_0
  point_categorical_colors.palette: *ref_0
  point_colors.categorical_palette: *ref_0
  map_colors.categorical_palette: *ref_0
  legend_categorical_points.swatch_width: 1.25
  legend_categorical_map.swatch_width: 1.25
  legend_categorical_points.swatch_height: 0.625
  legend_categorical_map.swatch_height: 0.625
  legend_categorical_points.swatch_radius: 0
  legend_categorical_map.swatch_radius: 0
colors:
  - Social:
      - '#ff0055'
      - '#00ccff'
      - '#0066ff'
      - '#b1e645'
      - '#f2e5da'
      - '#65798c'  
fonts:
  - name: Metric Web
    url: >-
       https://public.flourish.studio/fonts/8ab4830d-7b12-4282-8a18-875a832832cf/stylesheet.css
